title: 10,000 Hours
alt: I'm proud to announce that as of this year I've become a world-class expert at chewing.
transcript:
[Cueball is staring at his phone. A report from the phone is shown above his head]
If you buy into the "10,000 hours" thing, you are now a world-class expert![Caption below comic]
My screen time reports have started trying to put a positive spin on things.
